p: In the present study, the concentration of β-caryophyllene supplied via essential oil in PmEO100CP group is not as much as that administered in the β-caryophyllene group, however both groups demonstrated comparable and similar antioxidant, anti-inflammatory and anti-apoptotic effects. These effects shown by the PmEO100CP group could be due to the presence of other compounds in P. minus essential oil that might work synergistically.
